H0.text: J. E. Brandenberger, a Swiss chemist and textile engineer, discovered the process to make what. Rayon

H1.text: J. E. Brandenberger, a Swiss chemist and textile engineer, discovered the process to make what. Nylon

H2.text: J. E. Brandenberger, a Swiss chemist and textile engineer, discovered the process to make what. Polyester

H3.text: J. E. Brandenberger, a Swiss chemist and textile engineer, discovered the process to make what. Celophane

A4.text: The first rayon was made by Louis Marie Hilaire Bernigaut in 1884.

A5.text: He patented his production process in 1885.

A6.text: Cellophane was invented by Swiss chemist Jacques E. Brandenberger in 1908.
